feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-15T10:05:00.600173Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Quake 的闪电枪错误解释</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T05 :04:15.796483Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc"/>; <author>; <name>;henning</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=henning</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/4gNYTqn3qRc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quake-s-lightning-gun-bug-explained" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硬件黑客绕过 Bios 密码</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.cybercx.co.nz/bypassing- bios-密码</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T09:04:15.797006Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.cybercx.co.nz/bypassing-bios-password"/>; <作者>; <name>;cptwin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cptwin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://blog.cybercx.co.nz/hubfs/221005_CYBERX_SESSION3_37926copy-1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;初学者在联想笔记本电脑上执行 BIOS 密码绕过的硬件黑客之旅。在本文中，我们确定问题所在，如何识别易受攻击的芯片，如何绕过易受攻击的芯片，并最终确定这种攻击有效的原因以及可以阻止它的方法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hardware-hacking-to-bypass-bios-passwords" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337687" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ESP32-C3 无线探险：物联网综合指南 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T04:04:15.797400Z</更新>; <link href ="https://www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章是乐鑫关于ESP32-C3微控制器SoC的一本书的总结，成本- 连接设备的有效解决方案。本书涵盖与物联网开发相关的各种主题，包括物联网项目开发、硬件设计、无线通信和量产优化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#esp32-c3-wireless-adventure-a-comprehensive-guide-to-iot-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本周 Rust 499</stitle>; <id>;https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2023 /06/14/this-week-in-rust-499/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:04:15.797799Z</updated>; <link href="https://this-week-in -rust.org/blog/2023/06/14/this-week-in-rust-499/"/>; <author>; <name>;unripe_syntax</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=unripe_syntax</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Rust 本周是对 Rust 编程语言的进展和社区的每周总结。它包括构建管道、回归、改进、RFC 和即将到来的 Rust 事件的更新。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-week-in-rust-499" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36337500" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4 的原生 JSON 输出</stitle>; <id>;https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:04:15.798165Z</更新>; <link href="https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt-4"/>; <author>; <name>;yonom</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yonom</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fbcf4d45c- 57cd-4dca-b2d3-2f173af25df0_1600x1024.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了在集成 LLM（大型语言模型）以生成 JSON 等结构化数据时使用函数调用。这项新功能简化了流程，并允许来自 GPT 调用的更可靠的 JSON 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#native-json-output-from-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;11 年托管 SaaS 的经验教训</stitle>; <id>;https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting-a -saas</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T06:04:15.798522Z</更新>; <link href="https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/11-years-of-hosting-a- saas"/>; <author>; <name>;ghiculescu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ghiculescu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws。 com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb51ff6cc-04f6-43a5-be58-fa15ae72214c_1560x500.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;本文反映了作者运行 Web 应用程序 11 年的经验，讨论了部署、托管和基础架构管理方面的挑战和经验教训。它涵盖了作者从使用 Heroku 到迁移到 Digital Ocean 和最终迁移到 AWS 的旅程，强调了一路上的困难和错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lessons-learned-from-11-years-of-hosting-a-saas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用核心 Vim 动作快速移动</stitle>; <id>;https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu -with-vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:04:15.798873Z</更新>; <link href= “https://www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/boost-your-coding-fu-with-vscode-and-vim/moving-blazingly-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.barbarianmeetscoding.com/images/vim-motions-word.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：109px；" />;<br />;Vim 中的动作是允许快速和精确移动光标的命令。有不同类型的动作，例如单词动作和类似搜索的动作，每种动作都适合不同的目的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#moving-fast-with-the-core-vim-motions" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SETI 科学家制定月球监听站计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti-scientists-to-devise -plan-for-lunar-listening-station/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T01:04:15.799224Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti -scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station/"/>; <author>; <name>;yk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yk< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了在月球背面建立一个专门的 SETI 天文台的可能性。研究人员正在努力为这项任务定义技术规范，这将为正式的 A 阶段研究提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36334912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么核电站建设成本如此之高？</stitle>; <id>;https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-建设成本/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T22:04:15.799578Z</updated>; <link href="https://progress.institute/nuclear-power-plant-construction-costs/"/ >; <author>; <name>;镰刀</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scythe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://progress.institute/wp-content/uploads/image-12.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：162px；" />;<br />;随着技术的进步，核电站建设成本一直在增加。高成本主要是由于人工费用、监管增加以及需要能够在受损工厂中运行的冷却系统等因素造成的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-does-nuclear-power-plant-construction-cost-so-much" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;被困在卡车下</stitle>; <id>;https://www.propublica.org/article/underride-crashes-nhtsa-dot-iihs -safety-cars-trucks</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T21:04:15.800271Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.propublica.org/article/underride-crashes-nhtsa- dot-iihs-safety-cars-trucks"/>; <author>; <name>;danso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danso</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20230613-KillerTrucks_Crash.JPG?crop=focalpoint&fit=crop&fm=webp&fp-x=0.5&fp-y =0.5&h=534&q=75&w=800&s=4ac007fa7a1ab5b8b545a546a21b279e" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;联邦安全监管机构忽视了科学研究，未能采取行动防止涉及重型卡车的致命撞车事故。小型车辆从大型商用卡车下方滑过的撞车事故很常见，每年导致数百人死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trapped-under-trucks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36332086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;以幼稚为常态（2018）</stitle>; <id>;https://iq.hse.ru/en/news/219491658.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T07 :04:15.800616Z</updated>; <link href="https://iq.hse.ru/en/news/219491658.html"/>; <author>; <name>;yamrzou</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yamrzou</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hse.ru/data/2018/05/ 25/1149448088/9f4cda8fc1ea4de28b0897fdf01d2d4b.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：160px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了对人类年龄和成年期的看法是如何变化的，许多人推迟了成年期的过渡，并表现出幼稚的迹象。由于社会和个人生命历程的变化，传统的按年龄划分的生命周期已不再适用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#infantilism-as-a-norm-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36318780" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU——比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量</stitle>; <id>;https://llm-utils.org/Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+ -+比较+可用+容量+在+GPU+云+供应商</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:04:15.800962Z</更新>; <link href="https://llm-utils.org /Nvidia+H100+and+A100+GPUs+-+comparing+available+capacity+at+GPU+cloud+providers"/>; <author>; <name>;tikkun</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator. com/user?id=tikkun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Nvidia H100 和 A100 GPU - 比较 GPU 云提供商的可用容量 - LLM Utils <a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#nvidia-h100-and-a100-gpus-comparing-available-capacity-at-gpu-cloud-providers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333321" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何在 40 小时内抓取 25 亿个网页（2012 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl- a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:04:15.801301Z</updated>; <link href="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/ how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/"/>; <author>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =swyx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/quarter_billion_page_crawl_big_picture.png" 样式="宽度：220px； height: 133px;" />;<br />;作者使用 20 个 Amazon EC2 机器实例在不到 40 小时的时间内抓取了超过 2.5 亿个网页。他们想了解抓取一小部分 Web 所需的资源并描述他们的详细信息这篇文章中的项目。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.nassiben.com/video-based-crypta</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:04:15.801659Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nassiben.com/video- based-crypta"/>; <author>; <name>;jedisct1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jedisct1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/a53494_34b76e649d0d4b8180617a88c0553ecb~mv2.jpeg/v1/fill/w_211,h_189,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/a534 94_34b76e649d0d4b8180617a88c0553ecb~mv2。 jpeg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 198px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了基于视频的密码分析，这是一种新方法，允许攻击者通过分析设备电源 LED 的视频片段从设备中恢复密钥。通过利用设备功耗之间的相关性设备和电源 LED 的亮度，攻击者可以使用商用摄像机来提高采样率并恢复密钥。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#recovering-secret-keys-from -devices-using-video-footage-of-their-power-led" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331446 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;科学家在土卫二上发现磷</stitle>; <id>;https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T23： 04:15.802006Z</updated>; <link href="https://tlpnetwork.com/news/2023/06/scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tlpnetwork.com/images/logo -main.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;科学家们在土星的卫星土卫二上发现了生命必需元素磷。这一发现基于美国宇航局卡西尼任务收集的数据，表明土卫二可能具有支持生命存在的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-phosphorus-on-enceladus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36333762" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;AMD openSIL 开源固件概念验证</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/openSIL/openSIL</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T20： 04:15.802358Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/openSIL/openSIL"/>; <作者>; <name>;wmf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=wmf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/cf2bf1fb9deb7bd9fd10ddc5c3b480463dc968dc2ededde5de150e0fd6bb149c/openSIL/openSIL" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;此提交不属于此存储库上的任何分支，并且可能属于存储库外部的分支。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# amd-opensil-open-source-firmware-proof-of-concept" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36331394" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;关于 John Wick 的缓慢生产力</stitle>; <id>;https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T02： 04:15.803049Z</updated>; <link href="https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick/"/>; <author>; <name>;lawgimenez</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lawgimenez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://calnewport.com/wp-content/上传/2023/06/wick-640-px.png" style="width: 220px; height: 113px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了 Cal Newport 于 2007 年推出的“Study Hacks”博客，该博客获得了大量读者，涵盖技术、生产力和深度生活等话题世界。在 2022 年，Cal 还推出了一个名为 TheDeepLife.com 的新门户，用于提供与深度生命运动相关的其他内容。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-the-slow-productivity-of -john-wick" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335104" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1906 年旧金山地震的目击者描述</ stitle>; <id>;https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T06:04:15.803391Z</更新>; <link href="https:// publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity"/>; <author>; <name>;samclemens</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samclemens</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://publicdomainreview.org/static/pdr-circles-66b0b7b42092975f0d5502ab646d9fa8.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;文章描述了当局如何在 1906 年旧金山地震期间使用炸药作为灭火技术。尽管效果有限，他们继续使用炸药炸毁城市的大片区域，包括范尼斯大道上一英里半的维多利亚式房屋。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eyewitness-accounts-of-the-1906-san-francisco-earthquake" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;程序员对 CPU 缓存的误解</stitle>; <id>;https://software. rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:04:15.803735Z</更新>; <link href="https: //software.rajivprab.com/2018/04/29/myths-programmers-believe-about-cpu-caches/"/>; <author>; <name>;whack</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=whack</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://softwarerajivprab.files.wordpress.com/2019/07/cache.png" 样式="宽度：220px； height: 259px;" />;<br />;作为一名在 Intel 和 Sun 从事高速缓存工作五年的计算机工程师，我对高速缓存一致性了解了一两件事。这是最难理解的概念之一回到大学学习 - 但一旦你真正理解它，它会让你非常欣赏​​系统设计原则。你...... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#myths-programmers-believe-about -cpu-caches" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333034" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我是一名急诊医生。以下是我的工作方式我已经在使用 ChatGPT 来帮助治疗患者</stitle>; <id>;https://inflethealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor-here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to- help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T22:04:15.804091Z</更新>; <link href="https://inflecthealth.medium.com/im-an-er-doctor -here-s-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients-a023615c65b6"/>; <author>; <name>;SLHamlet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=SLHamlet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1053/1*zVkc5iNVMQQIApQS_OKAAA.jpeg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;AI，特别是 ChatGPT，有可能改变医疗保健，但它的直接影响在于较小的应用程序。例如，急诊医生一直在使用 ChatGPT 与患者及其家人进行有效沟通，提供明确的解释并减轻他们的顾虑。这改善了医患关系，并使医疗专业人员能够专注于提供优质护理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#im-an-er-doctor -heres-how-im-already-using-chatgpt-to-help-treat-patients" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36332999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人在 2021 年发现了加州大学伯克利分校的骨架</stitle>; <id>;https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found- 2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T03:04:15.804450Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/ 12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/"/>; <author>; <name>;yawnxyz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=yawnxyz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/content/images/size/w256h256/format/jpeg /2022/09/The-Berkeley-Scanner_Icon_Color-1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;承包商两年前在加州大学伯克利分校的一座废弃建筑中发现了骨骼残骸，并向加州大学的一位主管报告，但主管没有通知警方。由于缺乏行动，工人们感到沮丧今年 1 月向加州大学警察局报告了遗体，使此案进入公众视野。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-uc-berkeley-skeleton- 2021 年" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335581" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我在 21 小时内启动了 Linux 293k 次</stitle >; <id>;https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T14:04:15.804792Z</更新>; <link href="https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux-292612-times/"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;而且只用了 21 个小时。Linux 6.4 有一个错误，它在启动时挂起，但可能只有千分之一的启动（如果出于某种原因使用 Intel 硬件，则更少）。令人惊讶对我来说，没有人注意到这一点，但我确实注意到了，因为我们使用 libguestfs 的 nbdkit 测试是随机的…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-booted-linux-293k-times-in -21 小时" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325986" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Credal.ai (YC W23) – 企业 AI 的数据安全</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T16:04:15.805484Z</updated>; < link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525"/>; <author>; <name>;r_thambapillai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= r_thambapillai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Credal.ai 提供聊天 UI 和 API，为使用语言模型及其公司数据的公司实施数据安全措施。它们解决了与数据控制、可见性和访问控制相关的安全和隐私障碍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-credal-ai-yc-w23-data-safety-for-enterprise-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;长尾去哪儿了？ (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.honest-broker.com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T20:04： 15.805830Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.honest-broker.com/p/where-did-the-long-tail-go"/>; <author>; <name>;nickwritesit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch /w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F251717c1-623d-45 34-a8c6 -e0aae4488dd6_900x512.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了反文化的衰落及其与长尾概念的联系。它争辩说，本应振兴文化并支持不同声音的长尾理论从未兑现其承诺。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#where-did-the-long-tail-go-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310967" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gorilla：与 API 连接的大型语言模型</stitle>; <id>;https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-14T22:04:15.806176Z</updated>; <link href="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/"/>; <author>; <name>;throwaway888abc</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=throwaway888abc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shishirpatil.github.io/gorilla/assets/img/gorilla_method .png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;Gorilla 是一种微调的大型语言模型 (LLM)，在生成准确的 API 调用和减轻幻觉问题方面优于 GPT-4。它展示了 LLM 通过 API 调用有效使用工具并适应测试时文档更改的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gorilla-large-language-model-connected-with-apis" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36333290" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;每日定理：参考书目</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theoremoftheday.org/Resources/Bibliography.htm</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-15T07:04:15.806526Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theoremoftheday.org/Resources/Bibliography.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;vo2maxer</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vo2maxer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章是Robin Whitty维护的参考书目，收集个人推荐进一步阅读的书籍定理页。参考书目包括指向引用每本书的定理的链接，并提供额外的信息和评论。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#theorem-of-the-day-bibliography" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;维修电子产品：循环经济解决方案</stitle>; <id>;https://nextbillion.net/repairing -electronics-circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T19:04:15.806869Z</updated>; <link href="https://nextbillion.net/repairing -electronics-circular-economy-solution-ewaste-rural-africa/"/>; <author>; <name>;mooreds</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mooreds</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nextbillion.net/wp-content/uploads/erlend-ekseth-0a5VbkqqFFE-unsplash-copy-150x150.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 220px;" />;<br />;赞比亚的 SolarAid 在农村地区开展了一项太阳能灯回收计划，以延长太阳能灯的使用寿命。他们聘请了当地的技术人员，并推出了一款移动应用程序来帮助修复太阳能灯，赋予它们第二次生命，并提供更长时间的清洁照明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#repairing-electronics-a-circular-economy-solution" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316848" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
